subject: Hiring of IT manpower for Data Lake Operations - reg.
text: HRaiv <4q rTHRf gfea5rut (Tsw5 4Rdev &r THNif HFT, HRG FRGR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 774 *4dt 6i-5 & 6, #arr-10, #RqT, `f fcrit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 T/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ IT/2022 Policy Circular No.6.32/2022 dated 22nd September , 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No_ NHAI/IT/2021 /IT Manpower-PIUs (Part-File-1) (Computer No: 65873)} Sub:: Hiring of IT manpower for Data Lake Operations reg: Ref.: Circular No. NHAIIT/ Data Lake/2021/07 dated 01.03.2021. (ii) Circular NHAI/IT/ Data Lake/2021/07 dated 29.06.2021. (iii) Policy Circular No. 6.30/2022 dated 27th April, 2022. With the approval of Competent Authority, one manpower for each Members, CGMs at NHAI-HQs ROs & PDs was approved exclusively for updating information in Data Lake Portal. 2  The Data Lake operators were imparted comprehensive training by Data Lake team. The weekly; monthly input into the Data Lake System have been standardised. Further , vide OM dated 15.03.2022, the basic Standard Operating Procedures (SoPs) encompassing duties to be performed by Data Lake Operators were issued and concerned reporting officer Viz. CGMs, ROs, etc. were requested to monitor the performance of these operators: 3 The request for extension of Data Lake operators are received from ROs PIUs during their discussion with senior management of NHAI: Accordingly the matter has been reviewed and the following has been decided: 3.1 Each RO and PIU is authorized to engage one Data Lake Operator_ who will carry out activities as defined in the SoP's dated 15.03.2022 issued by IT division. 3.2 The engagement of such resource shall be made through a transparent procedure for one (01) year, which may be further extended by the reporting officer, on year on year basis for maximum two (02) years, subject to continuing requirement of NHAI and satisfactory performance of the Datalake operator. In exceptional cases, extension beyond three (03) years will be with the approval of the Chairperson and entail a fresh contract with the agency/personnel. 3.3 Engaging fresh or extension of Operator in field are delegated to the concerned ROs PDs. 3.4 The concerned RO/PD, as the case may be, shall supervise and certify completion of task by the operator as per SoPs, before releasing their bills. 4 This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. 2~/o2/ 22 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 _ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2.
